subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Pat Perez shot a 61 to take the lead in the Bob Hope Chrysler Classic on a warm, still day in the desert resort area of La Quinta, Calif. His sparkling 11-under-par round was good enough for only a one-shot lead.
snippet: Pat Perez shot a 61 to take the lead in the Bob Hope Chrysler Classic on a warm, still day in the desert resort area of La Quinta, Calif. His sparkling 11-under-par round was good enough for only a one-shot lead.
